verbs.description: President Donald Trump 's legal team [V: has] made a broad assertion of executive privilege in a bid to avert a subpoena by the special counsel .
[ARG0: President Donald Trump 's legal team] has [V: made] [ARG1: a broad assertion of executive privilege] [ARGM-PNC: in a bid to avert a subpoena by the special counsel] .
[ARG0: President Donald Trump 's legal team] has made a broad assertion of executive privilege in a bid to [V: avert] [ARG1: a subpoena by the special counsel] .
